rukus.text: Mori no hitobito mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Shuaibu ga kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomenai. Watashi e no hoshu wa, ii ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Keiryo o jubun ni atae, son o sa sete wa narimasen
tanin no mono o sashu shite wa narimasen. Mata meiwaku o oyobosu okonai o shite, chijo o taihai sa sete wa narimasen
Anata gata to mae no sedai no mono-tachi o tsukura reta kata, kare o osore nasai
Suru to kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen
Anata wa watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Do kangaete mo anata wa kyogen no todesu
Anata no iu koto ga shinjitsunara, ten'noikkaku o watashi-tachi no ue ni otoshi nasai
Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Watashi no omo wa, anata gata no suru koto o yoku shitte ora remasu
Daga kare-ra wa kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sorede ano insan'na hi no chobatsu ga kare-ra o osotta. Sore wa hontoni kibishi chobatsu no hideatta
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru
